About Fintroduction


Fintroduction was born out of a simple goal, to bring financial education to everyone.


Fintroduction aims to be an easy introduction to the daunting world of finances through short, informative, approachable articles.


Each article serves to be a short lesson that has all the information needed for a solid understanding of each topic.
